'''Shelly''' is a co-worker of [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]]'s, portrayed by [[Nancy Cassaro]].

In "[[The One Where Nana Dies Twice]]", she mistakenly assumes that Chandler is gay and tries to set him up with another co-worker, [[Lowell]]. She apologized for her error and tells him that he just had a vibe that hinted otherwise. Later on, Lowell was able to tell her that Chandler was not gay and she misread him.
